menu.title: Event Rules
menu.content:
A way of expanding the horizon of architecture with a twist of using bamboo to all its strength, involving creativity at its best.
The result of the same leads to modern day ideas involving contemporary techniques and tools.

RULES:-
--	Maximum no. of Entries-7
-	Maximum no. of team per college - 01 
-	Maximum no. of participants per Team - 06
-	Time Limit- 12:00 hrs.
-	Design Problem will be announced on 4THFeb, 2016& it could be downloaded from B.B.D University/UTKARSH,2016 Website or Display Board.

menu.title: Event Rules
menu.content:
Model making is a logical next step in the thinking process for many ideas.Once someone starts using materials and fabrication techniques they are able to refine their idea to make them work.In a way everyone is a model maker when they translate an idea into physical reality.
RULES:-
-	Maximum no. of Entries-10
-	Maximum no. of teams per college -02
-	Maximum no. of participants per team -03
-	Time Limit- 03:00 hrs.
-	Theme will be provided on the spot
-	Materials will be provided on the spot.

menu.title: Rules
menu.content:
Costume design is an envisioning of clothing and the overall appearance of a character or performer.It may contribute the fullness of the artistic, visual world which is unique to a particular theatrical or cinematic production.
RULES:-
-	Maximum no. of Entries- 10
-	Maximum no. of team per college - 02 
-	Maximum no. of participants per team - 03
-	Time Limit- 1:00 hrs.
-	Theme will be provided on the spot
-	Materials will be provided on the spot.

menu.title: Rules
menu.content:
The expression of thoughts through paints and brushes has been one of the most ancient form of art.Paintings can be naturalistic or representational and may serve to manifest the expressive and conceptual intention of the practioner.
RULES:-
-	Maximum no. of Entries- 10
-	Maximum no. of team per college - 02
-	Maximum no. of participants per team - 03
-	Time Limit- 5:00 hrs.
-	Theme will be provided on the spot
-	Materials will be provided on the spot.
-	Participants are expected to bring their own extra color brushes. 
-	Canvas size 36” x 36”

menu.title: Rules
menu.content:
Mehendi is a ceremonial art form centered on the idea of “awakening the inner light”.One of India’s oldest traditions,mehendi designing involves the use of traditional symbols, geometrical patterns or even modern symbols, etc.
RULES:-
-	Maximum no. of Entries-25
-	Maximum no. of team per college - 03
-	Maximum no. of participants per team - 02
-	Time Limit- 1:00 hrs.
-	Theme will be provided on the spot
-	Materials will be provided on the spot.
-	Only One hand will be judged

menu.title: Rules
menu.content:
Wall painting involves a genre of artistic representation of different themes ranging from comic to social or political.It can be writing or drawings that have been scribbled, scratched, or painted illicitly on a wall.It has gained a lot of importance in the modern contemporary world.
RULES:-

-	Maximum no. of Entries-10
-	Maximum no. of team per college-01
-	Maximum no. of participants per team - 03
-	Time Limit- 02:30 hrs.
-	Materials will be provided on the spot.

menu.title: Rules
menu.content:
The purpose of rangoli is decoration, also it is thought to bring goodluck. Designs are passed from one generation to the next keeping both the art form and the tradition alive.It is an art which precedes sculpture and painting.
RULES:-
-	Maximum no. of Entries – 10
-	Maximum no. of team per college - 01
-	Maximum no. of participants per team - 03
-	Time Limit- 2:00 hrs.
-	Theme will be provided on the spot
-	Participants are expected to bring their own materials.
-	It can be made with materials like marble dust, wooden dust, and colors etc.
-	Maximum size 1m X 1m

menu.title: Rules
menu.content:
A sketch usually implies a quick loosely drawn work.The most visual artists use, to a greater or lesser degree, the sketch as a method of recording or working out ideas.The ability to quickly record impressions through sketching has found varied purposes in today’s culture.
RULES:-	
-	Maximum no. of Entries-20
-	Maximum no. of team per college - 03
-	Individual event.
-	Sketching to be done with charcoal pencil only.
-	Time Limit- 01:00 hrs.
-	Theme will be provided on the spot
-	Materials will be provided on the spot.
-	Participants are expected to bring their own extra pencils & erasers. 
-	A-3 Size sheet will be provided.
